iiv.io

Class SleepFileReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.io.Reader
      • java.io.InputStreamReader
        • java.io.FileReader
          • iiv.io.SleepFileReader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    SleepReader, java.io.Closeable, java.lang.AutoCloseable, java.lang.Readable

    public class SleepFileReader
extends java.io.FileReader
implements SleepReader
    Class extends FileReader avoiding blocking by sleeping until ready.
    Since:
    iiV1.1
    See Also:
    CNUViewer
